item.title: Fireside chat: Designing for Data with Dr. Dan Hayden
item.description: Fireside chat with Dr. Dan Hayden. Photo by D91 Labs I got invited by D91 Labs to host a fireside chat with Dr. Dan Hayden — Data Strategist at Facebook in Dublin, co-lead of the Design Jam program & TTC Labs. He spoke about Designing for Data through examples and case studies from Lab’s work. Post his talks, I engaged him with a few questions around Dan’s career path, his work principles, and importance of social sciences in design.
